title: David Autor named NOMIS 2023 Distinguished Scientist
summary: David H. Autor, an economist at MIT, has been named one of the 2023 NOMIS Distinguished Scientists for his research on the impact of technological change and globalization on jobs and earnings. The award recognizes researchers who have made significant contributions to their fields. Autor will also lead the NOMIS Foundation's Expertise project, which aims to understand how new technologies like AI will affect expertise. Colleagues and fellow economists have praised Autor's work for its insights and contributions to labor economics. The awards will be presented in October in Zurich, Switzerland.
